## Vector4.FromFloatsToRef() method

Updates the given vector "result" coordinates from the given floats.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static FromFloatsToRef(x: number, y: number, z: number, w: number, result: Vector4): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>number</code> | float to set from |
|  y | <code>number</code> | float to set from |
|  z | <code>number</code> | float to set from |
|  w | <code>number</code> | float to set from |
|  result | <code>Vector4</code> | the vector to the floats in |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
